amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funding for any Federal employee health plan that does not offer contraceptive coverage with an exception made for certain religious based plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funding to enter into or renew a contract which includes a provision providing prescriptive drug coverage except where the contract also includes a provision for contraceptive coverage for Federal health plans.

action.text: Mr. Smith (NJ) raised a point of order against the Lowey amendment (A007). Mr. Smith of New Jersey stated that the provisions of the Lowey amendment consitute legislation on an appropriations bill. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
On agreeing to the Lowey amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 198 (Roll No. 290).
